text:
Just a kopitiam
Food is good
Very tasty and well done
Must try
Definitely better then the neighbouring stalls who are either rude or inconsistent standards

Date of visit : Tue 1st Sep 2024
Time : 8.45 pm

First time trying this stall.

Ordered the yam ring priced at $20 and 1 rice at $0.70.

The yam is over fried, slightly dry and taste slightly sourish.
The soya bean imitations of the meat aren’t tasty. Too many pieces.

This review is based only the yam ring dish.

A friend recommended this store and there's so many good reviews so decided to give it a try.
There was a long line so we waited some time for the food to be served.

Price:
$30++ for 2
Slightly expensive for hawker food

Taste:
It's relatively normal for all dishes and nothing spectacular.

There are so many better options out there with a fraction of the price.
If you do visit, I would recommend you to get one main course instead of zi char.

Food quality getting worse, didnt make any effort to ensure quality of it. Bad to Worse.

Not worth the time to wait up to 30mins n the price kept increasing.

I like the service where the auntie brings the food to you.

Food is also great and is one of those few wok hey style vegetarian cooking.
